attributes.additional_details: Passports do not show if the person has the virus. With a negative test this shows that the person is okay and therefor will stop the spread when entering nightclubs and late venues.
attributes.background: Stop the rollout of covid vaccine passport. We should be using a negative test instead.'

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

You might also like to sign these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
